attributes.action: Free 15min parking per session in all local authority designated parking areas.
attributes.additional_details: Councils made a surplus of £635million on parking in 2013/14
attributes.background: Often drivers feel they have received a parking ticket for staying only a few seconds over there designated period. There a distrust between drivers and local authorities, drivers believing that they are being penalised by Councils raising parking fees to cover other council spending.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to require all councils to offer 15 minutes of free parking in all local authority parking spaces.
